name: Palemoon Customize Toolbar reskin light
description: for Palemoon or any pre-Australis build of Firefox using the old customize toolbar window (idk of any others tho). This' an alternative/companion to my dark theme version here
additional_info: • With min-width, 500px will show 4 columns flush with scrollbar, 618px 5 columns • fwiw the default customize window sorely lacks a min-width, as is, will shrinks to 140px, so if you dont try this style, suggest at least giving the default a min-width by adding the following to a new style @-moz-document url(chrome://global/content/customizeToolbar.xul) { #CustomizeToolbarWindow #main-box { min-width: 523px; } } • if you still use Firefox, see my customize window theme for it here in a similar style to this light reskin
